title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.3 - Petitions for amendments to this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.3 - Petitions for amendments to this part

State Regulations

Any person or entity may at any time petition the
commissioner in writing to revise, amend or revoke any provision of this
section. The petition should set forth the terms or the substance of the rule
desired, with a statement of the reasons therefor and the effects
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
803.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
